Package simpleGUI.base

Class NavigationBar

java.lang.Object
simpleGUI.NavigationBar
public class NavigationBar extends Object
Hold navigation elements that will be placed on its attached window.

    • addNavigationButton

      public NavigationButton addNavigationButton(Window targetWindow, String buttonName)
      Add a NavigationButton to the NavigationBar.
      Parameters:
      targetWindow - The window the button will navigate to when clicked.
      buttonName - The name of the button. Will be displayed.
      Returns:
      new NavigationButton

    • setNavigationButtonName

      public void setNavigationButtonName(String oldButtonName, String newButtonName)
      Set the name of the NavigationButton.
      Parameters:
      oldButtonName - The old name of the NavigationButton.
      newButtonName - The new name of the NavigationButton.

    • setNavigationButtonTarget

      public void setNavigationButtonTarget(String buttonName, Window newTargetWindow)
      Set the target window of the button, to a new window.
      Parameters:
      buttonName - The name of the button.
      newTargetWindow - The new target window of the button.
